init

()

Defined in src\Titan\View.js:84

Method called after the View is initialised. Empty by default, it can be overridden to provide functionality

initialize

()

Defined in src\Titan\View.js:43

Method called when View is initialised. This should not be overridden. If additional functionality is required, you should override the init method instead. Renders the template and injects the corresponding styles into the DOM. It also checks data-name for uniqueness, and data-widget in order to render a sub-view.

render

() View

Defined in src\Titan\View.js:22

Triggered when rendering the View. Checks if it the View is already rendered. If it is, it will remove all events from the View, re-render it, and apply events back to it, otherwise it will render it normally.

Returns:

View: This View is returned to allow for chained methods.
